Burger is adequate and large but WOW never coming here again. Waited 39 minutes for a takeout burger with "patatas aioli". Wasn't busy,  3pm on a Monday. Want to see what €3.40 of patatas alioli looks like here? Four steamed new potatoes. Yes,  four tiny steamed new potatoes. (See photo.)  What the what?! Never again. Disgusting.Incidentally, I also ordered €0.80 mayo on my burger and was charged €1.40 for alioli instead. This despite having a menu system where you check boxes for what you want on a form, so no excuses. Rip-off.
